price: (yaitu) orang-orang yang menghalangi (manusia) dari jalan Allah dan menghendaki (supaya) jalan itu bengkok.  Dan mereka itulah orang-orang yang tidak percaya akan adanya hari akhirat.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبۡغُونَهَا عِوَجٗا وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yaṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi wayabghūnahā ʿiwajan wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūna
